Intents: 

20hghoqiuegg9277481s: Add linked login

H9285jhp2mdi8sd7g3yu: Error message

Classify the following message received by a customer of a gaming app by its intent. The intent should be from the list above and your output should be a YAML containing only the intent ID. 

Message: I set up login through Facebook but I want to remove that and just login with my email instead

rejected:
-  2089ghqoisjv71or58hah: Delete linked login

This user wants to delete a linked sign in method (Facebook) and use another one (email) instead, so the intent is to delete a linked login.
